question.pageTitle: Part I: Determining Strategies and Response Plan
question.instructiontext: Select all that apply, then click Done.
question.questiontext:
While you're working on your field assessment, you learn that the Aircraft Maintenance personnel brought several solvents with them to clean aircraft parts under a 100-hour inspection procedure. They have also requested that the contracting officer procure additional products.

An admin troop is concerned about the vapors generated in the hangar where she works. Which pieces of equipment will most likely help you assess the risk?
